Method.name: Init
Method.Implementation:
set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "ru", "ManNotFoundByNumber") = "Партнер не найден!" set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "en", "ManNotFoundByNumber") = "Man not found!" set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "de", "ManNotFoundByNumber") = "Partner nicht gefunden!"
set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "ru", "WomanNotFoundByNumber") = "Партнерша не найдена!" set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "en", "WomanNotFoundByNumber") = "Woman not found!" set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "de", "WomanNotFoundByNumber") = "Partnersuche nicht gefunden!"
set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "ru", "CoupleNotFound") = "Пара не найдена!" set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "en", "CoupleNotFound") = "Couple not found!" set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "de", "CoupleNotFound") = "Paar gefunden!"
set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "ru", "AddParticipantError") = "При добавлении участника возникла ошибка" set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "en", "AddParticipantError") = "When you add a participant error occurred" set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "de", "AddParticipantError") = "Wenn Sie einen Teilnehmer Fehler aufgetreten hinzufügen"
set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "ru", "createLoc") = "Мультиязычное поле не создано" set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "en", "createLoc") = "Multilanguage field is not created" set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "de", "createLoc") = "Mehrsprachig Feld wird nicht erstellt"
set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "ru", "DancerClassNotFound") = "Класс не найден" set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "en", "DancerClassNotFound") = "Dancer class not found" set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "de", "DancerClassNotFound") = "Klasse nicht gefunden"
set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "ru", "DeactivateCompetitionError") = "Произошла ошибка при удалении группы" set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "en", "DeactivateCompetitionError") = "Error occurred while deleting a competition" set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "de", "DeactivateCompetitionError") = "Beim Löschen einer Gruppe ist ein Fehler aufgetreten"
set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "ru", "DeactivateTournamentError") = "Произошла ошибка при удалении турнира" set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "en", "DeactivateTournamentError") = "Error occurred while deleting a tournament" set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "de", "DeactivateTournamentError") = "Beim Löschen des Turniers ist ein Fehler aufgetreten"
set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "ru", "deleteLoc") = "Произошла ошибка при удалении мультиязычного поля" set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "en", "deleteLoc") = "An error occurred while removing a multilingual field" set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "de", "deleteLoc") = "Beim Entfernen eines mehrsprachigen Gebiet ist ein Fehler aufgetreten"
set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "ru", "DeletePerson") = "Произошла ошибка при удалении спортсмена" set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "en", "DeletePerson") = "An error occurred while removing the athlete" set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "de", "DeletePerson") = "Beim Entfernen der Athlet ist ein Fehler aufgetreten"
set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "ru", "EmptyMaleAndFemaleNamesOnTicket") = "Пустые фамилии участников в билете" set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "en", "EmptyMaleAndFemaleNamesOnTicket") = "Empty male and female last names on ticket" set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "de", "EmptyMaleAndFemaleNamesOnTicket") = "Leere Namen der Teilnehmer in der Ticket"
set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "ru", "NoPrivilegeForDelete") = "Нет привилегий на удаление" set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "en", "NoPrivilegeForDelete") = "No privilege for delete" set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "de", "NoPrivilegeForDelete") = "Keine Berechtigung zum Löschen"
set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "ru", "NoPrivilegeForUpdate") = "Нет привилегий на обновление" set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "en", "NoPrivilegeForUpdate") = "No privilege for update" set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "de", "NoPrivilegeForUpdate") = "Keine Privilegien zu aktualisieren"
set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "ru", "RegistrationClosedError") = "Регистрация невозможна" set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "en", "RegistrationClosedError") = "Registration is not possible" set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "de", "RegistrationClosedError") = "Keine Anmeldung ist"
set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "ru", "SaveCompetitionError") = "При сохранении группы произошла ошибка" set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "en", "SaveCompetitionError") = "When you save a competition error occurred" set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "de", "SaveCompetitionError") = "Wenn Sie eine Gruppe Fehler aufgetreten sparen"
set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "ru", "SaveFeedBackError") = "При сохранении отзыва произошла ошибка" set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "en", "SaveFeedBackError") = "When you save a feedback error occurred" set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "de", "SaveFeedBackError") = "Unter Beibehaltung ein Fehler aufgetreten Bewertungen"
set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "ru", "saveLoc") = "Сохранение мультиязычного поля невозможно" set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "en", "saveLoc") = "Saving a multilingual field is impossible" set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "de", "saveLoc") = "Speichern einer mehrsprachigen Gebiet ist unmöglich"
set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "ru", "SaveParticipantError") = "Сохранение участника невозможно" set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "en", "SaveParticipantError") = "Saving the participant is impossible" set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "de", "SaveParticipantError") = "Speichern der Partei kann nicht sein"
set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "ru", "SaveTournamentError") = "Сохранение турнира невозможно" set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "en", "SaveTournamentError") = "Saving the tournament is impossible" set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "de", "SaveTournamentError") = "Speichern des Turniers kann nicht sein"
set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "ru", "WdsfManSaveError") = "Создание WDSF участника невозможно (мужчина)" set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "en", "WdsfManSaveError") = "Create WDSF participant is impossible (male)" set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "de", "WdsfManSaveError") = "Neues WDSF Partei unmöglich (männlich)"
set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "ru", "WdsfWomanSaveError") = "Создание WDSF участника невозможно (женщина)" set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "en", "WdsfWomanSaveError") = "Create WDSF participant is impossible (female)" set ^CacheMsg("Dance", "de", "WdsfWomanSaveError") = "Neues WDSF Partei unmöglich (weiblich)"
q $$$OK
